titleStmt.title: Foure speeches delivered in Guild-Hall on Friday the sixth of October, 1643. At a common-hall, vpon occasion of desiring the assistance of our brethren of Scotland in this warre. / Viz. the [brace] 1. by Mr. Solicitor. 2. by Mr. Edmund Calamy. 3. by Mr. Jeremiah Burroughes. 4. by Mr. Obadiah Sedgewick. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, Thomas, Sir, 1591-1652.
Calamy, Edmund, 1600-1666.
Burroughs, Jeremiah, 1599-1646.
Sedgwick, Obadiah, 1600?-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Cotes, for Jo. Bellamie, and are to bee sold at his shop at the sign of the three Golden Lions in Cornhill, neer the Royall Exchange.,

notesStmt.note: The words "1. by Mr. Solicitor. .. Sedgewick." are bracketed together on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
